mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (mid, mpassword, mname, memail, mtel, mzipcode, maddress1, maddress2, mgrade, mdate, mpoint, menabled) VALUES (#{mid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mpassword, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mtel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, #{maddress1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maddress2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'silver', sysdate, 0, 0)
